channel.title: Astronomical event of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the astronomical event of the day.

item.title: Meteor Shower (play)
item.description: Meteor Shower is a 2016 play written by Steve Martin. The play, a comedy, is set in 1993 in Ojai, California. It premiered on Broadway in 2017. Amy Schumer received the production's sole Tony Award nomination.
